content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</origin> <pubdate>20130301</pubdate> <title>AgSat Imagery Collection Footprints</title> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Salt Lake City, Utah</pubplace> <publish>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</publish> </pubinfo> <onlink>http://www.arcgis.com/home/webmap/viewer.html?webmap=f935f20666eb446c94ebcdaae943d606</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract>The AgSat Imagery Collection Footprints map shows the imagery footprints which have been collected under the USDA satellite blanket purchase agreement.  Click on a polygon inside the map to display an informational pop up window which provides information about each imagery collection.  </abstract> <purpose>To provide a public coverage map of imagery footprints acquired through the USDA satellite blanket purchase agreement so that agencies know what is already being collected and duplication of effort can be reduced.</purpose> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>2013</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>Current as of 01-14-2014</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>In work</progress> <update>Periodically as funding/information is available</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-168.15</westbc> <eastbc>-38.34</eastbc> <northbc>64.18</northbc> <southbc>12.85</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>None</themekt> <themekey>farming</themekey> <themekey>Disaster</themekey> <themekey>FSA</themekey> <themekey>Imagery</themekey> <themekey>Web Map</themekey> <themekey>satellite</themekey> <themekey>APFO</themekey> <themekey>AgSat</themekey> <themekey>ArcGIS Online</themekey> <themekey>drought</themekey> <themekey>USDA</themekey> <themekey>BPA</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekt>Geographic Names Information System</placekt> <placekey>"United States"</placekey> <placekey>US</placekey> <placekey>North America</placekey> <placekey>State</placekey> </place> </keywords> <accconst>None</accconst> <useconst> The map is for illustrative purposes only.  It is not suitable for surveying or engineering purposes, The Aerial Photography Field Office asks to be credited for derived products. </useconst> <ptcontac> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>2222 West 2300 South</address> <city>Salt Lake City</city> <state>Utah</state> <postal>84119-2020</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>801-844-2900</cntvoice> <cntemail>jacque.lacroix@slc.usda.gov</cntemail> </cntinfo> </ptcontac> <browse> <browsen> http://www.arcgis.com/sharing/rest/content/items/f935f20666eb446c94ebcdaae943d606/info/thumbnail/ago_downloaded.png </browsen> <browsed>ArcGIS Online REST endpoint content</browsed> <browset>PNG</browset> </browse> <native>Windows 7 Enterprise Version 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1 Build 7601, ESRI ArcGIS Desktop 10.1, ArcGIS Online</native> </idinfo> <dataqual> <logic>Areas are based on the most recent acquisitions from the USDA satellite blanket purchase agreement.</logic> <complete>None</complete> <posacc> <horizpa> <horizpar>N/A</horizpar> </horizpa> <vertacc> <vertaccr>N/A</vertaccr> </vertacc> </posacc> <lineage> <srcinfo> <srccite> <citeinfo> <origin>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</origin> <pubdate>2013</pubdate> <title>AgSat Imagery Collection Footprints</title> <onlink>http://services.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/World_Topo_Map/MapServer</onlink> </citeinfo> </srccite> <srcscale>10</srcscale> <typesrc>Digital Map, digital vector layer, digital base map tiled service</typesrc> <srctime> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>2012-2014</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <srccurr>USDA satellite blanket purchase agreement - latest acquisitions, ESRI World Topo base map - latest edition</srccurr> </srctime> <srccitea>N/A</srccitea> <srccontr>Aerial Photography Field Office USDA satellite blanket purchase acquisition polygon layers, ESRI World Topo base map available on ArcGIS Online.</srccontr> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc>This ArcGIS Online digital map was created by uploading a shapefile of image footprint polygons directly to the map using the ArcGIS Online interface.  The AgSat imagery footprints layer was created at APFO using ArcGIS desktop and information obtained from the USDA satellite blanket purchase agreement.</procdesc> <procdate>20130301</procdate> </procstep> </lineage> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <indspref>"US",</indspref> <direct>Vector</direct> <rastinfo> <rasttype>Pixel</rasttype> </rastinfo> </spdoinfo> <spref> <horizsys> <planar> <mapproj> <mapprojn>WGS 84 Web Mercator Auxiliary Sphere</mapprojn> <mapprojp></mapprojp> </mapproj> <planci> <plance>coordinate pair</plance> <coordrep> <absres>0.1</absres> <ordres>0.1</ordres> </coordrep> <plandu>meters</plandu> </planci> </planar> <geodetic> <horizdn>WGS 84</horizdn> <ellips>WGS 1984</ellips> <semiaxis>6378137</semiaxis> <denflat>298.257</denflat> </geodetic> </horizsys> </spref> <eainfo> <overview> <eaover> The map layer:  AgSat Imagery Footprints contains the following fields and attributes -  Name - Denotes image file name. State - General location of imgery. Img_Provid - Image provider. Inspected - Indicates the status of the APFO imagery inspection. Sensor - Indicates the satellite sensor which collected the imagery. Cloud_Cov - Up to 10% is the standard specification for this program, this field indicates if the imagery meets the specification or has greater than 10% cloud cover. Agency - Indicates the agency that used the blanket purchase agreement. </eaover> <eadetcit>The attribute values for all AgSat imagery footprints were derived from the USDA satellite blanket purchase agreement information.</eadetcit> </overview> </eainfo> <distinfo> <distrib> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>APFO Contracting Department</cntper> <cntorg>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>2222 West 2300 South</address> <city>Salt Lake City</city> <state>Utah</state> <postal>84119-2020</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>801-844-2900</cntvoice> <cntemail>jacque.lacroix@slc.usda.gov</cntemail> </cntinfo> </distrib> <resdesc>ArcGIS Online Web Map</resdesc> <distliab> In no event shall the creators, custodians, or distributors of this information be liable for any damages arising out of its use (or the inability to use it). </distliab> <stdorder> <digform> <digtinfo> <formname>ArcGIS Online Web Map, ESRI ArcGIS Tiled Base Map Service</formname> <formcont>N/A</formcont> </digtinfo> <digtopt> <onlinopt> <computer> <networka> <networkr>http://www.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=f935f20666eb446c94ebcdaae943d606</networkr> </networka> </computer> </onlinopt> <offoptn> <offmedia>N/A</offmedia> <recfmt>N/A</recfmt> </offoptn> </digtopt> </digform> <fees>N/A</fees> </stdorder> </distinfo> <metainfo> <metd>20140331</metd> <metc> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>2222 West 2300 South</address> <city>Salt Lake City</city> <state>Utah</state> <postal>84119-2020</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>801-844-2900</cntvoice> <cntemail>joan.biediger@slc.usda.gov</cntemail> </cntinfo> </metc> <metstdn>Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn> <metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv> </metainfo> </metadata>
